welcome.title: Welcome to Wave Terminal
welcome.supportGithubDesc: We're open source and committed to providing a free terminal for individual users. Please show your support by giving us a star on Github (wavetermdev/waveterm)
welcome.joinCommunityDesc: Get help, submit feature requests, report bugs, or just chat with fellow terminal enthusiasts. Join the Wave Discord Channel

notelemetrystar.thankYou: Thank you for trying Wave Terminal!
notelemetrystar.noTelemetryDesc: You've chosen to disable telemetry. While we respect your choice, telemetry data helps us improve Wave Terminal for everyone.
notelemetrystar.considerEnabling: Please consider enabling telemetry in the future if you'd like to help us make Wave better.
